about_description: Volty is an intelligent energy management app for Egyptian homes. Monitor your consumption, control your devices, and get smart recommendations to save on electricity bills.
analytics_subtitle: Detailed view of your energy consumption
devices_subtitle: Manage and monitor your smart devices
about_volty_desc: Volty is a smart energy management system designed specifically for Egyptian homes. Monitor your energy consumption in real-time, control your devices remotely, and get detailed analytics with smart recommendations to save on electricity bills.
company_description: We specialize in developing advanced software solutions and smart energy management systems that help Egyptian families optimize energy consumption and save on electricity bills.
faq_a1: Volty is a smart energy management system designed for Egyptian homes. It helps you monitor energy consumption in real-time, control devices remotely, and provides smart recommendations to reduce electricity bills.
faq_q2: How does Volty help save on electricity bills?
faq_a2: Volty analyzes your consumption patterns, identifies energy-wasting devices, provides smart scheduling recommendations, calculates Egyptian tier costs, and sends alerts when approaching higher pricing tiers. On average, users save 35% on their electricity bills.
faq_q3: What devices can I control with Volty?
faq_a3: You can control most smart home devices including air conditioners, lights, water heaters, washing machines, refrigerators, and any device connected to smart plugs. The app supports monitoring up to 15 devices.
faq_q4: Does Volty work with solar panels?
faq_a4: Yes! Volty has full integration with solar energy systems. You can track energy production, storage levels, and manage consumption to maximize the use of solar power.
faq_q5: How accurate is the energy monitoring?
faq_a5: Volty provides real-time monitoring with high accuracy. The system tracks consumption at the device level and compares it with normal usage patterns to detect anomalies.
faq_a6: Absolutely. Volty uses end-to-end encryption for all data transmission and storage. We implement advanced security measures and multi-level access permissions to protect your home's privacy.
faq_q7: How does the Egyptian tier calculation work?
faq_a7: Volty automatically calculates your electricity costs based on Egyptian consumption tiers. The app sends notifications when you're approaching the next tier threshold, helping you manage consumption to stay in lower-cost tiers.
faq_q8: Can I schedule devices to run at specific times?
faq_a8: Yes! The smart scheduling feature allows you to set devices to run during off-peak hours or lower-cost time periods, maximizing your savings automatically.
faq_q9: What kind of reports does Volty provide?
faq_a9: Volty generates detailed weekly and monthly reports showing consumption patterns, peak usage times, cost breakdowns by device, comparisons with previous periods, and personalized recommendations for energy savings.
faq_q10: How do I get technical support?
faq_a10: Our technical support team is available 24/7. You can reach us through the app, email us at contact@barmajha.com, or call +20 127 066 1064. We also provide online training sessions for new users.
faq_q11: Is there a free trial available?
faq_a11: Yes! We offer a complete trial version with full access to all premium features, support for up to 15 devices, AI-powered recommendations, free technical support, and an interactive user guide in Arabic.
faq_q12: What makes Volty different from other energy apps?
faq_a12: Volty is specifically designed for Egyptian homes with features like Egyptian tier calculations, Arabic interface, 24/7 local support, solar integration optimized for Egypt's climate, and AI recommendations based on Egyptian usage patterns.
